==Description
* Project>Search
* Folder>Search or Selection>Search?
* Open modal dialog
* Option: controlled/not controlled
* Start separate thread with the list of relative paths
* Display in a separate tab "Search Results"
==Another option
Do it in wiki. 
* Open a search form
* List results as links
==Resolution
Implemented using Windows Shell Search utility. The user can select project folder (including the root folder) and execute Selection>Search With Shell.
